amendment.description: Page 15, line 10, strike "reviewed, approved, and" and insert "reviewed, and". ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 110-450 to provide that the Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry shall not directly or indirectly offer educational courses for pre-licensure or continuing education for mortgage originators. In approving courses under this Act, the Nationwide Mortgage Licensing System and Registry shall apply reasonable standards in the review and approval of courses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meeks (NY) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Meeks (NY).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meeks (NY) amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
